patterns: What are some places to visit in Bhopal?
Give me names of places to visit in Bhopal
List all the places that can be visited in bhopal
What are some tourist attraction in Bhopal?
responses: Some places to visit in Bhopal are Upper Lake, Van Vihar National Park, Shahpura Lake, People's mall, Sair Sapata, Bharat Bhawan

patterns: What are some sports that one can play in MANIT?
List the sports one can play in MANIT
What are the sports I can play as in sports complex?
responses: Sports that one can play in MANIT are Cricket, Football, Basketball, Volleyball, Badminton, Table Tennis, Chess

patterns: Where will my classes be held in first year?
Where do I need to go to attend my classes on first day in college as first year?
Where is the classes generally held in first year?
responses: The classes of first year is held in NTB or the New Teaching block
To attend the classes in first year one should go to the New Teaching block.

patterns: What are some student clubs one can join in MANIT?
What are the names of societies in MANIT?
List the names of the student clubs in MANIT
responses: Some student clubs in MANIT are IBC, VISION, ISTE, AAROHA, AE SE AENAK, ROBOTICS CLUB, QUIZZERS CLUB

patterns: What are the depatments in MANIT
responses: The depaertments in MANIT are EE, CSE, ECE, MSME, CIVIL, CHEMICAL

patterns: Where is the dispensary in MANIT?
Where should I go in MANIT if I get sick?
Where is the treatment center in MANIT?
Hospital lookup for patient in MANIT
responses: One should go to dispensary in MANIT located in front of sports complex for treatment purpose.

patterns: Where do I get notice regarding college updates?
responses: Visit the institute website manit.ac.in for latest update
